body.name: Cuisinart Coffee Maker Barista System, Coffee Center 4-In-1 Coffee Machine, Single-Serve Coffee, Espresso & Nespresso Capsule Compatible, 12-Cup Carafe, Black, SS-4N1
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 10 hrs 44 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 10 hrs 44 mins
features: DRIP COFFEE: Experience convenience with fully automatic brewing and 24-hour programmability and enjoy up to 12 cups of coffee with the 12-cup glass carafe.
CONVENIENT FEATURES: Customize your coffee's freshness with adjustable Keep Warm and Auto Shutoff and Brew Pause features.
BREW CONTROL: Tailor the strength of your brew with the brew strength control and savor the rich flavors with the included gold tone, commercial-style, permanent filter, and charcoal water filter.

SINGLE SERVE BREWER: Choose from three brewing sizes: 6oz, 8oz, and 10oz to suit your preferred coffee strength using Keurig K-Cup*, other pods or our HomeBarista* reusable filter cup. Delight in both single and double espresso sizes to satisfy your caffeine cravings.
NESPRESSO COMPATIBLE CAPSULE BREWER: Indulge in Nespresso Original Line-style capsules for a premium coffee experience. Get creative with hot water, steamed, or frothed milk using the steam wand.
body.description: Bring the café home with the Cuisinart® Coffee Center® Barista Bar, and experience four brew options with compact convenience. Serve friends and family with 12 cups of fresh coffee brewed to perfection with programmable time, temperature, and strength settings. Or go solo with single-serve cups, in 6-, 8-, and 10-ounce sizes, made in minutes and compatible with most single-serve pods. For extra-bold flavor, pop in a Nespresso® OriginalLine-style capsule, and enjoy a single or double shot of espresso. Add variety to drinks with the steam wand that makes frothed and steamed milk for cappuccinos, lattes, or the specialty drink of your choice. The wand is also perfect for pouring hot water for tea, matcha, hot cereals, and soups. With sleek modern styling and total versatility, this space-saving all-in-one unit is sure to be the favorite spot in any kitchen.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 For 12-cup Brew 2 For single serve

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This coffee maker is a replacement for a high end appliance of a different brand. The coffee tastes good and it's nice to have a 12 cup pot. It's easy to make espresso in this machine too. We haven't cleaned it yet but I don't foresee any problems. At first I was taken aback a bit of having to take the tight fitting lid off to fill the pot with water, instead of just flipping the lid up. We also think it was confusing to turn the pot off, but have figured it out. Watching a You Tube video for this specific brand helped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does it all
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use all features. Takes Keurig pods, Nespresso, steams milk easily. Works beautifully

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy!
reviews.reviewText: First if you want to go def his coffee machine is for you. Got the coffee machine unpacked it and it looked great That is the only good thing I can say about it. Plugged it in and tried it. It made so much noise that my neighbor in my apartment building came over to find out what the noise was. Just making a cup of coffee.Packed it up sent it back. Do not buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Easy to Have a Delightful Cup of Whatever Whenever!
reviews.reviewText: This has been a WONDERFUL addition to my kitchen! Want a cup of soup from a soup mix? Use the instant hot water dispenser. (Which also steams milk, etc. with a turn of the button.) Want a quick cup of pick-me-up espresso? Use the single serve function and your choice of Nespresso originals. Want to brew a cup of tea with those tasty loose teas in your cupboard that you never brew because you don't want to have to clean the tea strainer? Use a Fanativita Disposable Coffee Filter for K-Carafe with a Cuisinart SS-RFC HomeBarista Reusable Filter Cup and all you'll do is pull the biodegradable/compostable paper filter out and toss it or recycle. I highly recommend this Barista system and also the two other products I mention above. They will add pleasure and convenience to your daily routine. By the way, my husband just loves that he can have hot cocoa any morning he wants it....even if we're out of milk. :) (I also got the delicious Starbucks hot cocoa K-Cup Pods.) Little treats to share and enjoy can make your day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good machine for the price
reviews.reviewText: Nice little machine. Makes great coffee make great expresso. Would have been five stars except for the following..... Reusable strainer is not fine enough for a finely ground coffee. Coffee grains will get through. Would be nice if steamer wand was flexible And make it easier to get Want in and out of cup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This machine works great for coffee, the steam wand is not something to be desired. It takes a while to heat the milk and doesn't create much foam, it is just OK. It is very nice to be able to use Keurig pods and nespresso pods, and regular brewed coffee. We use each option often. Because of the lack of performance of the steam wand I use a separate frother.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm a coffee snob and I admit it -- Buy This!
reviews.reviewText: I can't tell you how many coffee makers I've had over time looking to brew the best cup of strong coffee (Starbucks is my benchmark). Normally I'll find 2 out of the 3 things I'm looking for in a coffee maker, but this new Cuisinart 4 in 1 checks all my boxes. I like the fact that I can brew an expresso, or a travel mug with a K cup, hot water for tea or a full pot of rich strong coffee. The ONLY downside is when taking the K cups or Expresso pods out of the coffee maker, they tend to leak. I'd most definitely work on that. This Cuisinart does it all and with the quality expected from Cuisinart. This one gets two thumbs up from me. If you are a coffee snob like me, it's worth the price of admission.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What’s Not to Like?
reviews.reviewText: We have been using this Cuisinart Barista Bar every morning for about a month. We make about 6 cups every day. It is easy to use once you understand the controls. (Follow the manual.) We have made pots of coffee, K-cups, and Nespresso original capsules. We are mostly using the individual serve coffee features (I like K-cups and wife likes Nespresso.) We have not used the steam wand. No problems so far. Glad we purchased this coffee maker.
